duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform specimen accessioning, sample sorting, and data entry in a fast-paced, high-throughput environment.
Verify patient demographic information and enter it into the computer system for tracking purposes.
Pack and ship specimens to proper testing facilities when required.
Prepare and store excess specimen samples.
Resolve and document any problem specimens and handle medical and chemical waste.
Comply with applicable environmental health and safety policies and procedures.
Operate automated instrumentation under supervision if necessary.
